content: frankie s knitted stuff feathers this is a fun little pattern for some knitted feathers they re quick to knit and can be used as decorations or bookmarks … if you can stop the cat playing with them that is depending on the yarn used the finished feathers will be between 9 and 14 cm long 3½ - 5½ feather yarn needles length small 4 ply 2 75 mm 9 cm / 3½ small dk 3 25 mm 11 5 cm / 4½ big 4 ply 2 75 mm 11 5 cm / 4½ big dk 3 25 mm 14 cm / 5½ the 4 ply yarn i used had about 400 m in 100 g and the dk 300 m you will need double pointed needles as the stem of the feather is worked in i cord the rest is worked back and forth in garter stitch small feather using the long tail method cast on two stitches work eight row in i cord for the stem the main part of the feather is shaped in three sections each one making it a little wider use the cable method when casting on stitches section 1 row 1 cast on 4 k5 m1 k1 7 sts row 2 cast on 4 k5 p1 k5 11 sts row 3 kf&b k3 s2kp2 k4 10 sts row 4 kf&b k3 p1 k5 11 sts repeat row 3 & 4 three more times there will be five garter stitch ridges section 2 row 1 kf&b k to end 12 sts row 2 kf&b k4 p1 k6 13 sts row 3 kf&b k4 s2kp2 k5 12 sts row 4 kf&b k4 p1 k6 13 sts repeat row 3 & 4 three more times there will now be 10 ridges section 3 row 1 kf&b k to end 14 sts row 2 kf&b k5 p1 k7 15 sts row 3 kf&b k5 s2kp2 k6 14 sts row 4 kf&b k5 p1 k7 15 sts repeat row 3 & 4 three more times you will have knitted 15 ridges shaping the top row 1 k6 s2kp2 k6 13 sts row 2 k6 p1 k6 row 3 kf&b k4 s2kp2 k5 12 sts row 4 kf&b k4 p1 k6 13 sts row 5 k5 s2kp2 k5 11 sts row 6 k5 p1 k5 row 7 ssk k2 s2kp2 k2 k2tog 7 sts row 8 k3 p1 k3 row 9 ssk s2kp2 k2tog 3 sts cast off with the double decrease cast off slip one stitch knitwise knit two stitches together pass the slipped stitch over and fasten_off this picture shows small feathers knitted with dk and 4 ply variegated yarns big feather work to the end of section 3 of the small feather pattern section 4 row 1 kf&b k to end 16 sts row 2 kf&b k6 p1 k8 17 sts row 3 kf&b k6 s2kp2 k7 16 sts row 4 kf&b k6 p1 k8 17 sts repeat row 3 & 4 three more times there
